results.description: Real Madrid host Real Betis & Torino take on Juventus in the best of Sunday evening's European football - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Real Madrid v Betis & Torino v Juventus
results.title: Follow live text updates from Real Madrid v Betis & Torino v Juventus

results.description: Wolves book their place in the Europa League group stage after beating Torino in front of a jubilant Molineux.
results.shortTitle: Wolves beat Torino to reach group stage
results.title: Wolves beat Torino to reach Europa League group stage

results.description: Wolves are in a good position to qualify for the Europa League group stage for the first time after winning 3-2 away in Italy against Torino.
results.shortTitle: Wolves win against Torino in Italy
results.title: Torino 2-3 Wolves: Nuno Espirito Santo's side take advantage in Europa League play-off tie

results.description: Wolves beat Torino in the first leg of their Europa League play-off tie.
results.title: Europa League: Reaction as Wolves claim first-leg away win at Torino

results.description: French side Rennes activate a buyout clause to sign Senegal's M'Baye Niang on a permanent deal from Italy's Torino.
results.title: Senegal's M'Baye Niang joins Rennes on a permanent deal

thumbnail.altText: Senegal and Rennes striker M'Baye Niang

results.description: On the 70th anniversary of the tragedy, BBC Sport tells the story of the plane crash that killed Il Grande Torino, one of the greatest teams in Italian football history.
results.shortTitle: Superga: The crash that killed Serie A's champions
results.title: The plane crash that killed Serie A's champions and their English coach

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scores a late header for Serie A champions Juventus to deny neighbours Torino a first derby away win in 24 years.
results.shortTitle: Ronaldo saves Juve from derby defeat
results.title: Juventus 1-1 Torino: Cristiano Ronaldo saves champions from rare derby defeat

results.description: Inter Milan winger Ivan Perisic, who sat out his team's 1-0 defeat to Torino, hands in transfer request.
results.shortTitle: Arsenal target Perisic asks to leave Inter
results.title: Ivan Perisic: Arsenal target asks to leave Inter Milan

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's penalty settles the Turin derby as Serie A champions Juventus maintain their unbeaten start to the season by beating Torino.
results.title: Torino 0-1 Juventus

results.description: Lorenzo Insigne scores twice against Torino as Napoli make it four wins out of five in Serie A under Carlo Ancelotti.
results.shortTitle: Insigne scores twice in Napoli win
results.title: Torino 1-3 Napoli

results.description: League One Sunderland agree a fee with Serie A side Torino for midfielder Didier Ndong.
results.shortTitle: Ndong set to leave Sunderland for Torino
results.title: Didier Ndong: Sunderland agree fee with Torino for midfielder

results.description: Juventus need one point from their last two games to win the Serie A title for a seventh straight season after Napoli are held by Torino.
results.title: Napoli 2-2 Torino

results.description: Kostas Manolas dedicates his goal to ex-Roma team-mate Davide Astori as his side beat Torino in the first Serie A game since the Fiorentina's captain death.
results.title: Roma 3-0 Torino

results.description: Alex Sandro's first-half goal gives Juventus victory in the Turin derby and keeps them in touch with Napoli at the top of Serie A.
results.title: Torino 0-1 Juventus

thumbnail.altText: Alex Sandro celebrates scoring the winning goal for Juventus

results.description: Torino appoint former Watford boss Walter Mazzarri after sacking Sinisa Mihajlovic.
results.title: Walter Mazzarri replaces Sinisa Mihajlovic as Torino manager

results.description: Paulo Dybala scores twice to take his tally to 10 goals in six Serie A games as Juventus crush Torino in the Turin derby.
results.title: Juventus 4-0 Torino

thumbnail.altText: Juventus players celebrate scoring against Torino

results.description: Chelsea sign midfielder Danny Drinkwater from Leicester City for 35m, having also signed Torino full-back Davide Zappacosta.
results.title: Danny Drinkwater: Chelsea sign midfielder from Leicester

results.description: Opposition teams will sense a weakness in Joe Hart and there are replacements ready to step in, writes Phil McNulty.
results.shortTitle: Is Hart's time as England number one over?
results.title: Joe Hart's England place under pressure with replacements at the ready

results.description: Manchester City goalkeeper Joe Hart confirms he will leave Torino after a one-year loan at the Italian club.
results.shortTitle: Man City's Hart confirms Torino exit
results.title: Joe Hart: Manchester City goalkeeper confirms Torino exit

results.description: Joe Hart is beaten five times as Napoli thrash Torino to boost their chances of earning a spot in the Champions League group stages.
results.title: Torino 0-5 Napoli
